name: REZ
author: Kingsepulchure
notes: Whybona taught me a thing or two about REZ so I gave it a shot yesterday. Started in legend 2, didn't lose and went straight to KOG. MVP is probably storm. Most of wins were Storm + Red-Eyes Return + Econ plays at turn 3/4 for otk. Saw I needed to topdeck storm quite oftenly so put one more than in Whybona's deck. Rest is netdecked.
